<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List Evaluator Templates"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/simple/evaluators/templates"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the list of built-in evaluator templates.

These are static evaluator type definitions (not user-created configs).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"include_archived","in":"query","required":false,"schema":{"type":"boolean","default":false,"title":"Include Archived"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
